meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Emily Liu, FAICP, Director, Planning and Development
Lawrence Agu, III, AICP, Assoc AIA, Planning and Development

agenda_items.title: Update on the new Planning and Development Department
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the new Planning and Development Department.
agenda_items.presenter: Emily Liu, FAICP, Director, Planning and Development

agenda_items.title: Briefing on the ForwardDallas Comprehensive Land Use Plan
agenda_items.description: Draft Plan Updates and CPC Review Schedule.
agenda_items.presenter: Lawrence Agu, III, AICP, Assoc AIA, Planning and Development

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the June 17, 2024 City Plan Commission ForwardDallas Special Called Meeting and the June 20, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Authorization of a Hearing
agenda_items.description: Consideration of a public hearing to determine the proper zoning on property zoned Planned Development District No. 842 with Specific Use Permit (SUP) No. 1879 for a late-hours establishment limited to an alcoholic beverage establishment operated as a bar, lounge, or tavern.

agenda_items.title: Forward Dallas Public Hearing
agenda_items.description: Public hearing to receive comments on the ForwardDallas 2.0 comprehensive plan and consideration of an ordinance adopting the ForwardDallas 2.0 comprehensive plan.
